features: 🌹【10 PACK Hand Cream for Dry Cracked Hands】Shea Butter, Honey, Strawberry,Lavender, Coconut, Rose, Lemon, Tea Tree, Sweet Orange, Blueberry. Pick and choose your favorite scent based on your mood at the moment from our 10 natural fragrances.

🌿【Natural Hand Cream for Work】Natural plant ingredients, shea butter, sweet almond oil, aloe. This rich, deeply hydrating and moisturizing hand cream leaves hands smooth and rejuvenated. Leaves your hands hydrated and comfortable throughout the day.

🍁【For All Skin Types】 Natural vegetal extracts, non-greasy formula absorbs quickly and feels comfortable all day, works well for all skin type. Especially suitable for dry, water shortage, dry lines and present yellow skin.

🌴【Easy To Carry】 These are perfect when traveling because they do not take too much space and what is best is that you have 10 fragrances to choose from. The size of the container is the best to take everywhere. The tubes are portable, making them easy to fit in your purse or bag.
💋【The Perfect Gift For Any Occasion】The ideal present for Christmas, Valentine's, Mother's Day, Birthdays and Anniversaries. A wonderful gift for yourself,parent or for a loved one.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 10 Pack Plant Fragrance Hand Cream: Shea Butter, Honey, Strawberry,Lavender, Coconut, Rose, Lemon, Tea Tree, Sweet Orange, Blueberry. Pick and choose your favorite scent based on your mood at the moment from our 10 natural fragrances. The Perfect Gift for Any Occasion: The ideal present for Christmas, Valentine's, Mother's Day, Birthdays and Anniversaries. A wonderful gift for yourself,parent or for a loved one.
For All Skin Type Natural vegetal extract, work well for all skin type. Especially suitable for dry skin. Moisturise your skin.

Luxurious Natural Ingredients Hand Cream Shea Butter Easy to absorb , It can strengthen the skin moisturizing ability for dry skin. Jojoba Oil Jojoba oil is rich in vitamin D. It is a good moisturizing oil. It can maintain skin moisture, soften the skin, and keep the skin moisturized and smooth. Vitamin E Vitamin E protect sebum, and moisture in the skin. Helps to improve the skin. Aloe Extract Aloe have great moisturizing effects on the human body-especially for dry cracked skin,rough skin and so on. It is not greasy and absorbs very well.

Hand Cream For Dry Cracked Hands Using natural plant extracts and non-greasy formula.Rich in shea butter, natural aloe vera and vitamin E.Especially in cold or dry season, it helps to moisturize and soften dry skin, deeply nourish, leaving your hands smooth. Hand Cream For Work Plant Fragrance Hand Cream Moisturizing and Nourishing Hand Care Cream for Work.If you work with hands or click on the keyboard all day, this hand cream can moisturize dry skin. Natural Hand Lotion For Travel Size These are perfect when traveling because they do not take too much space.Making them easy to fit in your purse or bag.Perfect size hand cream for carry, travel, on the go or to keep in your handbag. Hydrating smooth your hands on any occasion.
The Perfect Gift for Any Occasions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great stocking stuffers!
reviews.reviewText: I must say that I am very surprised and happy that these little lotions are of great quality! They even smell great! They are also the perfect size to toss in my purse. I will definitely be buying them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love each one. Smells good, smooth lotion, no residue. Would make nice gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice scent. Soft, smooth lotion for hands.
reviews.reviewText: I love these lotions. I have a few away with Christmas gifts to the females in my family and then I kept some for myself. For $10, you can’t beat it!They’re great for the car, a purse, backpack, medicine cabinet;etc.I don’t have cracked hands so I can’t say they do anything for that but I always love putting lotion on my hands and these are nice! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great stocking stuffer
reviews.reviewText: These were well received Christmas stocking stuffers. The lotion works great on our dry skin. Will buy again next Christmas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The lotion is cute but barely moisturizing
reviews.reviewText: I used this as a goody bag stuffer for a birthday because I thought it looked cute and was a useful little gift, but when I used it myself, there was almost no scent and it was barely moisturizing my hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a Saran Wrap Ball game
reviews.reviewText: I used these for our annual saran wrap ball game at Christmastime, and they were a hit! I kept a few for myself and absolutely love them. Perfect for tossing in your bag or car so you always have it when you need it. Just love this variety pack!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really loved these! Came on wet and dried very smooth and kept my hands soft and smelling really good
